name: GD AutoBot Backtracker
description: Deterministic fast-forward trainer that backtracks taps/holds instead of randomizing, then replays best path

updates-per-frame.name: Training Speed (updates per frame)
updates-per-frame.description: Deterministic fast-forward: how many real GD updates to execute per rendered frame

inner-budget-ms.name: Inner Budget (ms)
inner-budget-ms.description: CPU time limit per rendered frame (prevents freezing)

max-frames.name: Max Frames Per Attempt
max-frames.description: Failsafe: restart if attempt runs too long

tap-length.name: Tap Length (frames)
tap-length.description: Default click length for newly created taps

max-shift.name: Max Shift (frames)
max-shift.description: How far earlier/later the bot will shift a tap/hold while searching

insert-offset.name: Insert Offset (frames)
insert-offset.description: If there is no tap near death, insert one at (deathFrame - offset)

mutation-window.name: Backtrack Window (frames)
mutation-window.description: Only segments starting within [death-window, death] are considered for the "last decision"

prefix-lock.name: Prefix Lock (frames)
prefix-lock.description: Never change segments starting earlier than (bestDeathFrame - window - prefixLock)

verify-after-win.name: Verify After Win
verify-after-win.description: After first completion, replay best at normal speed to confirm
